title: Keir Starmer – 2022 Statement on the Resignation of Boris Johnson
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 7 July 2022.
content:
It is good news for our country that Boris Johnson has resigned as Prime Minister.
